casebody.head_matter:
Gennarelli et ux., Appellants, v. Marple Township Board of Adjustment.
Argued November 19, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

January 15, 1969:
